tool_description: A database with a collection of technical specs of thousands of cars.
title: Automotive Car Specs

api_list.name: Get Brand Vehicle Spec
api_list.description: With this endpoint you can get the specifications of a car by Generation and Engine Modification
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://automotive-car-specs.p.rapidapi.com/cars/specs/{brand}/{model}/{generation}/{modification}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "automotive-car-specs.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Specifications of Generation
api_list.description: With this endpoint you can get the specifications of a certain model and generation within a brand
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://automotive-car-specs.p.rapidapi.com/cars/specs/{brand}/{model}/{generation}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "automotive-car-specs.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Brand Model Specs
api_list.description: With this endpoint you can get the specifications of a certain model within a brand

url = "https://automotive-car-specs.p.rapidapi.com/cars/specs/{brand}/{model}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "automotive-car-specs.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all the specs of brand
api_list.description: With this endpoint you can see all the specifications of all the vehicles of a specific brand.
api_list.code:
import requests

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

api_list.name: Get models of brand
api_list.description: With this endpoint you will be able to get all of the models of the selected brand
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://automotive-car-specs.p.rapidapi.com/cars/models/{brand}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "automotive-car-specs.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all brands models
api_list.description: With this endpoint you will be able to see all the models of the listed cars.

api_list.name: Get All Brands
api_list.description: With this endpoint you will be able to see all the brands that we have a collection of.
api_list.code:
